hero.name: Dr. Majdoline Aldeek
hero.title: Cosmetic Dentist & Aesthetic Specialist
hero.description: Let your smile shine with us. Specializing in cosmetic dentistry and facial aesthetics to enhance your natural beauty.

owner.title: Clinic Owner & Lead Dentist
owner.description: Founded and currently manage a thriving cosmetic dentistry practice specializing in smile makeovers and facial aesthetics.

specialist.title: Cosmetic Dentistry Specialist
specialist.description: Provided advanced cosmetic dental treatments including veneers, teeth whitening, and smile design.

resident.title: Dental Resident
resident.description: Completed comprehensive training in general dentistry with focus on restorative and pediatric dentistry.

cosmeticDentistry.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
cosmeticDentistry.description: Smile makeovers, teeth whitening, and porcelain veneers for perfect aesthetics

dentalBotox.title: Dental Botox
dentalBotox.description: Non-surgical facial rejuvenation and wrinkle reduction treatments

veneers.title: Porcelain Veneers
veneers.description: Custom-designed veneers to transform your smile

facialAesthetics.title: Facial Aesthetics
facialAesthetics.description: Dermal fillers and non-surgical facial enhancement

pediatricDentistry.title: Pediatric Dentistry
pediatricDentistry.description: Gentle dental care for children and adolescents

orthodontics.title: Orthodontics
orthodontics.description: Invisalign and traditional braces for perfect alignment

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: I believe every patient deserves personalized care that combines the latest dental techniques with an artistic eye for beauty. My approach focuses on creating natural-looking results that enhance your unique features.
philosophy.paragraph2: Patient comfort and satisfaction are my top priorities. I take time to understand each patient's goals and concerns to deliver treatments that exceed expectations.
